title: Boston African American National Historic Site: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       Ranger Guided Tours There is no fee for Ranger guided tours.  For tour information or to reserve a spot on the Black Heritage TrailÂ® Tour, please call: (617) 742-5415. The Museum of African American History Our partner, the Museum of African American History charges an entrance fee which supports the maintenance of the historic Abiel Smith School and African Meeting House. The Museum is located at 46 Joy Street, on Beacon Hill.  The fee structure is as follows:  Adults- $5, Senior Citizens - $3, 12-18 Years Old - $3, Children under 12 - Free, Museum Members - Free.  This fee is payable at the Museum Store located in the Abiel Smith School. The Museum of African American History is open Monday-Saturday from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m. throughout the year.
